bronx:
Zee: You said your dragon's name is Pixie?
Bronx: Yes, but she's not a dragon. She's a drakling.
Erik: -under his breath- ...Bastard Dragon...
Bronx: What?
Erik: I believe you were simply hearing the wind whisper in your ears. It can make funny noises sometimes.
Bronx: ...We're inside a building.
Erik: There's air conditioners in buildings.

Erik: Creepy eye dude. It's a fucking satan parrot. It also needs to die.
Bronx: -under his breath- Why does he keep saying satan for everything

Bronx: What, would you automatically think that b with six blank spaces would be bastard?
Erik: Yes, of course
Bronx: It could be babysat. Or baboons. Or a thousand other words.
Erik: Or it could be bastard
Bronx: The probability is supremely low
Erik: The probability of it being anything else is just as low.

Natasha: So. Casserole. What kind?
Bronx: .... Edible.
Zee: oh my god he put weed in the casserole
Bronx: I can neither confirm nor deny that possibility

Erik: So, what's your favorite color, Bronx?
Bronx: Orange. Why?
Erik: Just curious.
Bronx: ...And... what's your favorite color, Erik?
Erik: Green.
Bronx: I see. We are chromatically opposed.

[Bronx starts the engine. The radio is playing Ievan Polkka by Hatsune Miku at a moderate volume.]
Erik: Oh, this is a good song.
Bronx: Absolutely.
Erik: You like Miku Hatsune?
Bronx: Yes
caitlyn:
Caithlyn: My name is Caitlyn Grace Wright and I'm 20 years old and a new recruit at the Der'ika Command!
I don't know much about it yet, but today my crew is going to get an assignment from the very top! How exciting!
[Caitlyn runs into the door to the office she was headed to and falls down]
Caitlyn: Wow!!! My first time in the sewers! I'm sure there's plenty of adventure to be had down here!

Caitlyn: I'm so glad I brought my flashlight!
[Her flash light flickers out and dies]
Caitlyn: Well exploring in the dark is pretty cool too! Like a horror movie.

natasha:
Gus: SHIT!
Natasha: Gus doesn't sound very happy.
Emily: Gus...can swear??
Natasha: Yes
Emily: How- how can he vocalize?

Natasha: SHIT!
Erik: Yeah, I wonder where he learned it from.

[A Carpenter Ant of Unusual Size suddenly appears, walking towards them at a relatively slow speed]
Natasha: -pulls out a fucking pistol and shoots it, then speaks in russian- Insects...
Erik: Couldn't you have just stepped on it?
Natasha: ....Well yes. But it was far away.
Erik: Then why didn't you walk over?
Natasha: I just wanted to shoot a giant ant ok

Zee: So, which store are we heading to?
Natasha: The General Store.
Zee: Gee what a boring name
Natasha: That's what they want you to think.
Natasha: I've got plenty of Pussy if you ever need it then.

[Natasha looks at the Ferata twins, suddenly completely serious.]
Natasha: There are no ants either of you have seen, right?
Erik: Uh.... no?
Natasha: -narrows her eyes- Those bastards are hiding in the walls.
[Natasha stands up and takes out a pistol, aiming it at the wall.]

[Natasha shoots the wall.]
